page.title: 17Clough Hall near Talke
page.content: Clough Hall Park is a very big area,the land is used in quite a few different ways.There is a park with many kinds of trees, a cricket ground, a pavillion for the players, four tennis courts, bowling greens, and a putting green. Clough Hall park is a very enjoyable leisure ground.Also there is a wood that you could go through, it is full of wildlife and there is a little pool. In the wood there are squirrels,butterflies,moths and many more things. In the pool there are tadpoles, frogs and a few toads.In the summer the leisure ground attracts many people young and old. There is a little stream that you can cross to get in and out, but there are also gates. Every year, on November 5th, there is a big bonfire.
